attributes.action: Lower Bus Fair Prices! & make sure theyll turn up!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government is trying to encourage people to use public transport (buses) rather than car but when the prices are ridiculous and your lucky ifthey do ever turn up why would people be fooled into it?

More people are staying in due to high bus fairs make them lower so people can enjoy life.

Please take this into account.
